content: **this pattern is available for free on my blog** however if you d like a concise printable pdf and you d like to support me as a designer please consider to purchase the pdf at a low price instructions on both the regular and xl version of the blanket are included in the pdf and instructions to alter the width of your blanket are you ready for a super fun crochet pattern my newest design the chevrainbow crochet blanket is wonderful mindless crochet and uses a bunch of colours i normally only use a few colours for a project so this was really out of my comfort zone i hadn t expected to like the outcome this much and i hope you will like it too this pattern uses 1x stonewashed & riverwashed colour pack 10x stonewashed 50g 1 ball in each of the following colours and also in order of usage 815 green agate 825 malachite 826 fosterite 827 peridot 806 canada jade 819 new jade 801 moon stone 817 citrine 812 lemon quartz 833 beryl
